articles.author: Rob Dawson
articles.title: Man United's Ralf Rangnick on Anthony Martial omission in draw vs. Aston Villa: 'He didn't want to' - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Manchester United interim boss Ralf Rangnick has said Anthony Martial "did not want" to be part of the side's draw against Aston Villa on Saturday.
articles.content:
Manchester United interim boss Ralf Rangnick has said forward Anthony Martial "did not want" to be part of the squad to face Aston Villa on Saturday, forcing United to leave a bench spot vacant.
